answer:
Please contact your local public health unit and ask to speak to a public health nurse. They can advise you as to whether vaccines can be given prior to your trip. You will find their number here.
Immunization Nurse
question: My baby is one month and 22 days going on a plane trip in 6 days (dec 18) should she be vaccinated beforehand?
question_variation_1: what age should a newborn be vaccinated
question_variation_2: should my baby be vaccinated before travel
